auth.invalidCredentialsErrorMessage: Wrong username / email or password. Please try again.
auth.invalidEmailFormatErrorMessage: Wrong email format. Make sure your email format is name@domain.com
auth.invalidPasswordFormatErrorMessage: Password has to be at least 6 characters long. Please try again.
auth.invalidUsernameFormatErrorMessage: Please change the username so it has at least 3 characters, starts with a letter and contains only letters, numbers and underscores.
auth.profileUpdatingErrorMessage: There was an error while updating your profile. Please try again.
auth.socialLoginSectionTitle: or sign in/sign up with your other account
auth.unknownEmailErrorMessage: Your username / email was not found.
auth.usernameTakenErrorMessage: That email or username is taken. Please choose another one or try to sign in.
